content.question: In lines 7-8, the words quae, Tiberine, videbis funera are translated

choices.label: who will see the funerals of Tiberinus
what funerals you will see, Tiberinus
who will see Tiberinus at the funerals

content.answer: what funerals you will see, Tiberinus

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
